    • Constructor Detail

      • Monster

        public Monster​(char symbol,
               int xSpritePos,
               int ySpritePos,
               int nbSprites,
               Permeability permeability,
               Position position,
               Behaviour behaviour)
        Creates a monster.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol.
        xSpritePos - the x position on the SpriteSheet.
        ySpritePos - the y position on the spriteSheet.
        nbSprites - the number of sprites.
        permeability - the permeability of the monster.
        position - the position of the monster on the map.
        behaviour - the behaviour of the monster.
